stepTitle: At $$500$$ K, the equilibrium constant is: K=3.62×10**(-6). If a $$4.30$$ M solution of HCN is prepared and allowed to reach equilibrium at $$500$$ K, what is the equilibrium concentration of H+ in moles?
stepBody: Hint: Use ICE Table to solve and show your work and can neglect $$x$$ in denominator
